hide-player-ui.setting-form-hint: Configuration menu for which elements to show / hide.
hide-player-ui.setting-form-hide-logo-no: Hides Foundry logo in upper left corner of the screen
hide-player-ui.setting-form-hide-navigat: Hides navigation tiles across top of screen
hide-player-ui.setting-form-hide-control: Hides player controls across left of screen
hide-player-ui.setting-form-hide-sidebar: Hides sidebar across right of screen
hide-player-ui.setting-form-hide-players: Hides active players display in bottom left of screen
hide-player-ui.setting-form-hide-hotbar-: Hides hotbar across bottom of screen
hide-player-ui.setting-form-refresh-play: Player sessions will have to be refreshed for these changes to take effect.
